welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Colorado Springs, known for its stunning natural beauty and outdoor adventures. We invite you to explore our city and enjoy all it has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Butts AAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Butts AAF Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at USAF Academy Airstrip Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at USAF Academy Airstrip Airport is used for military and government flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Colorado Springs Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: West Terminal
terminals.description: The west terminal at Colorado Springs Airport is exclusively used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
